law.catch_line: Conversion of domestic mutual insurer to stock insurer.

text.section: A domestic mutual insurer may convert to a stock insurer by amendment of its articles of incorporation and upon compliance with the requirements of KRS 304.24-600 to 304.24-625 and the applicable requirements of this subtitle and Subtitle 3 of this chapter.
A domestic mutual insurer shall only convert to a stock insurer in accordance with a plan of conversion approved by the commissioner.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1350, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
